properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarvamupai sarvamupai silva veyabadinattivade Padamulabadi pujintumu sarvamupai hechinchedevudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarwamupai yesu rajyamelun papi mitrudu gorrepillaku Mana moravina kireetamu nichi hechinche devudaayanan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tuphanu Bhayankaralache kottunappudu mora pettaga Yesunu vedaga nee chetito patti silalapai nadpinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pattanamu lathigoppavainan addamulu balamainapudun Nirbayamuga saguchundumu sarvamupai nunna vaanidwaaraa{/lang-eng}
